/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with lush green trees that add a touch of nature to the urban setting. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to illuminate the path as dusk falls. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban architecture and natural elements.
